articles.description:
Soviet Union prior to its collapse is an interesting analogy for present day US federal government.
Think US will be harder to take down tho as it’s the reserve currency and its corporates are by far the strongest to have ever existed.

Balaji: It’s like the Soviet Union.
In its last days it put Swan Lake on TV.
As the communist hardliners lost.
Because they lost control of narrative.
That’s what’s happened to wokes.
Regime media has lost control.
